__get
PHPSpec_Specification::__get() in Specification.php
Very similar to __call(), simply diverts property requests to relevant methods (which allows the dropping of method braces) or returns an instance of self. So "$spec->be" equates to "$spec->be()".

autotest
PHPSpec_Console_Command::autotest() in Command.php
The autotest() static method serves as PHPSpec's Autotester. It will run all tests continually, with 10 second delays between each iterative run and report as normal for each iteration to the console output.
